name: Stir-Fried Vegetables with Almonds
description: With just a few simple steps, you’ll have a healthy meal on the table with a whole serving of veggies! Almonds are a great source of healthy fats, protein, and fibre. They’re also rich in vitamin E, an antioxidant that helps neutralize free radicals and prevent them from causing cell damage.

ingredients.name: carrot
ingredients.additionalInstruction: cut in half lengthwise and julienned

preparation: Heat a Wok or a frying pan over medium-high heat. Add oil and swirl to coat pan.
Quickly stir-fry carrot, celery, pepper, onion and almonds. Add seasoning or dry glaze, soy sauce, and water.
Add mushrooms and cabbage. Stir for approximately 5 minutes, or until cabbage is wilted.
Season with Salt and Pepper and serve immediately.
perfectlyBalanceYourPlate: Serve with 4 oz (113 g) lean protein and 1⁄2 cup cooked grains.

products.name: Asian Stir-Fry Seasoning
summary: Your go-to for stir-fries, sautéed vegetables or add as a seasoning to any rice and noodle dish.

products.name: Wok & Glass Lid
summary: Classic Wok with curvy side & generous surface area for stir-frying.
